overview: "I've always loved the sexual passion and freedom among man-fuckers in Mexico. And for years I've looked forward to producing a movie that featured nothing but Mexican dudes fucking and getting fucked. Working closely with the awesome guys at Mecos (slang for cum), we put together what I believe is a fuckin' scorcher of a video. If you guys enjoy it (and I've got a strong feeling you will), this will just be the first of a long series featuring Mexico's hottest, wildest butt-fuckers and cum-addicts."  — Paul Morris
title: Mecos (Cum)
